fields.name: eventID
fields.description: An identifier for the set of information associated with a dwc:Event (something that occurs at a place and time). May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to the data set.

fields.name: parentEventID
fields.description: An identifier for the broader dwc:Event that groups this and potentially other dwc:Events.

fields.name: decimalLatitude
fields.description: The geographic latitude (in decimal degrees, using the spatial reference system given in dwc:geodeticDatum) of the geographic center of a dcterms:Location. Positive values are north of the Equator, negative values are south of it. Legal values lie between -90 and 90, inclusive.

fields.name: decimalLongitude
fields.description: The geographic longitude (in decimal degrees, using the spatial reference system given in dwc:geodeticDatum) of the geographic center of a dcterms:Location. Positive values are east of the Greenwich Meridian, negative values are west of it. Legal values lie between -180 and 180, inclusive.

fields.name: geodeticDatum
fields.description: The ellipsoid, geodetic datum, or spatial reference system (SRS) upon which the geographic coordinates given in dwc:decimalLatitude and dwc:decimalLongitude are based.

fields.name: coordinateUncertaintyInMeters
fields.description: The horizontal distance (in meters) from the given dwc:decimalLatitude and dwc:decimalLongitude describing the smallest circle containing the whole of the dcterms:Location. Leave the value empty if the uncertainty is unknown, cannot be estimated, or is not applicable (because there are no coordinates). Zero is not a valid value for this term.

fields.name: footprintWKT
fields.description: A Well-Known Text (WKT) representation of the shape (footprint, geometry) that defines the dcterms:Location. A dcterms:Location may have both a point-radius representation (see dwc:decimalLatitude) and a footprint representation, and they may differ from each other.

fields.name: countryCode
fields.description: The standard code for the country in which the dcterms:Location occurs.

fields.name: eventDate
fields.description: The date-time or interval during which a dwc:Event occurred. For occurrences, this is the date-time when the dwc:Event was recorded. Not suitable for a time in a geological context.

fields.name: bibliographicCitation
fields.description: A bibliographic reference for the resource.

fields.name: datasetID
fields.description: An identifier for the set of data. May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to a collection or institution.

fields.name: datasetName
fields.description: The name identifying the data set from which the record was derived.

fields.name: fieldNotes
fields.description: One of a) an indicator of the existence of, b) a reference to (publication, URI), or c) the text of notes taken in the field about the dwc:Event.

fields.name: habitat
fields.description: A category or description of the habitat in which the dwc:Event occurred.

fields.name: institutionCode
fields.description: The name (or acronym) in use by the institution having custody of the object(s) or information referred to in the record.

fields.name: institutionID
fields.description: An identifier for the institution having custody of the object(s) or information referred to in the record.

fields.name: license
fields.description: A legal document giving official permission to do something with the resource.

fields.name: maximumDepthInMeters
fields.description: The greater depth of a range of depth below the local surface, in meters.

fields.name: minimumDepthInMeters
fields.description: The lesser depth of a range of depth below the local surface, in meters.

fields.name: rightsHolder
fields.description: A person or organization owning or managing rights over the resource.

fields.name: samplingProtocol
fields.description: The names of, references to, or descriptions of the methods or protocols used during a dwc:Event.

fields.name: sampleSizeUnit
fields.description: A numeric value for a measurement of the size (time duration, length, area, or volume) of a sample in a sampling dwc:Event.

fields.name: sampleSizeValue
fields.description: The unit of measurement of the size (time duration, length, area, or volume) of a sample in a sampling dwc:Event.

fields.name: eventID
fields.description: An identifier for the set of information associated with a dwc:Event (something that occurs at a place and time). May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to the data set.

fields.name: occurrenceID
fields.description: An identifier for the dwc:Occurrence (as opposed to a particular digital record of the dwc:Occurrence). In the absence of a persistent global unique identifier, construct one from a combination of identifiers in the record that will most closely make the dwc:occurrenceID globally unique.

fields.name: scientificName
fields.description: A string representing the taxonomic identification as it appeared in the original record.

fields.name: scientificNameID
fields.description: An identifier for the nomenclatural (not taxonomic) details of a scientific name.

fields.name: basisOfRecord
fields.description: The specific nature of the data record.

fields.name: occurrenceStatus
fields.description: A statement about the presence or absence of a dwc:Taxon at a dcterms:Location.

fields.name: identificationQualifier
fields.description: A brief phrase or a standard term ("cf.", "aff.") to express the determiner's doubts about the dwc:Identification.

fields.name: identifiedBy
fields.description: A list (concatenated and separated) of names of people, groups, or organizations who assigned the dwc:Taxon to the subject.

fields.name: recordedBy
fields.description: A person, group, or organization responsible for recording the original dwc:Occurrence.

fields.name: vernacularName
fields.description: A common or vernacular name.

fields.name: kingdom
fields.description: The full scientific name of the kingdom in which the dwc:Taxon is classified.

fields.name: phylum
fields.description: The full scientific name of the phylum in which the dwc:Taxon is classified.

fields.name: class
fields.description: The full scientific name of the class in which the dwc:Taxon is classified.

fields.name: order
fields.description: The full scientific name of the order in which the dwc:Taxon is classified.

fields.name: family
fields.description: The full scientific name of the family in which the dwc:Taxon is classified.

fields.name: genus
fields.description: The full scientific name of the genus in which the dwc:Taxon is classified.

fields.name: taxonRank
fields.description: The taxonomic rank of the most specific name in the dwc:scientificName.

fields.name: eventID
fields.description: An identifier for the set of information associated with a dwc:Event (something that occurs at a place and time). May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to the data set.

fields.name: occurrenceID
fields.description: An identifier for the dwc:Occurrence (as opposed to a particular digital record of the dwc:Occurrence). In the absence of a persistent global unique identifier, construct one from a combination of identifiers in the record that will most closely make the dwc:occurrenceID globally unique.

fields.name: measurementID
fields.description: An identifier for the dwc:MeasurementOrFact (information pertaining to measurements, facts, characteristics, or assertions). May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to the data set.

fields.name: measurementType
fields.description: The nature of the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion.

fields.name: measurementUnit
fields.description: The units associated with the dwc:measurementValue.

fields.name: measurementValue
fields.description: The value of the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion.

fields.name: measurementAccuracy
fields.description: The description of the potential error associated with the dwc:measurementValue.

fields.name: measurementDeterminedBy
fields.description: A list (concatenated and separated) of names of people, groups, or organizations who determined the value of the dwc:MeasurementOrFact.

fields.name: measurementDeterminedDate
fields.description: The date on which the dwc:MeasurementOrFact was made.

fields.name: measurementMethod
fields.description: A description of or reference to (publication, URI) the method or protocol used to determine the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion.

fields.name: measurementTypeID
fields.description: An identifier for the measurementType (global unique identifier, URI). The identifier should reference the measurementType in a vocabulary.

fields.name: measurementUnitID
fields.description: An identifier for the measurementUnit (global unique identifier, URI). The identifier should reference the measurementUnit in a vocabulary.

fields.name: measurementValueID
fields.description: An identifier for facts stored in the column measurementValue (global unique identifier, URI). This identifier can reference a controlled vocabulary (e.g. for sampling instrument names, methodologies, life stages) or reference a methodology paper with a DOI. When the measurementValue refers to a value and not to a fact, the measurementvalueID has no meaning and should remain empty.
